nodes.text: Giant sentries could be encountered in certain Sith temples on the planet Moraband. When Doctor Chelli Aphra entered a temple in a quest for the Sword of Khashyun, she and the two Shistavanen muscles who accompanied her encountered one such sentry, which wielded a mace. One of the Shistavanen was killed, but Aphra managed to dispatch the sentry with a thermal detonator.
